        Decode a image file into a Bitmap.

        Parameters:

        minSize - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@6c2612c1: minWidth the image must have.
        square - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@85fc2ae: width and height of the image should be same.
